member.summary: Ignore the delete request.

member.name: T:Insite.Integration.Enums.IntegrationFieldType
member.summary: Enum that represents the various field types of an JobDefinitionStepFieldMap.

member.name: F:Insite.Integration.Enums.IntegrationFieldType.Field
member.summary: For Refresh Jobs, From Property is Erp Field Name, To Property is Commerce Object Property the Erp Value will get written to. For Submit Jobs, From Property is Commerce Object Property Name, To Property is Erp Field the Commerce Object Property Value will get written to.

member.name: F:Insite.Integration.Enums.IntegrationFieldType.StaticValue
member.summary: For Refresh Jobs, From Property is set to the Static Value, To Property is Commerce Object Property the Static Value will get written to. For Submit Jobs, From Property is set to the Static Value, To Property is Erp Field the Static Value will get written to.

member.name: F:Insite.Integration.Enums.IntegrationFieldType.SystemSetting
member.summary: For Refresh Jobs, From Property is set to the System Setting Name, To Property is Commerce Object Property the System Setting Value will get written to. For Submit Jobs, From Property is set to the System Setting Name, To Property is Erp Field the System Setting Value will get written to.

member.name: F:Insite.Integration.Enums.IntegrationFieldType.Lookup
member.summary: For Refresh Jobs, this field type indicates that the To Property will indicate a contained Model object to lookup and the From Property will be the Natural Key property (or properties, comma separated) to do the lookup with.

member.name: F:Insite.Integration.Enums.IntegrationFieldType.ChildCollection
member.summary: For Refresh Jobs, this field type indicates that the To Property will indicate a child collection or many-to-many collection to add to and the From Property will be the Natural Key value property (or properties, comma separated) to lookup the object to add to the collection.

member.name: F:Insite.Integration.Enums.IntegrationFieldType.Content
member.summary: For Refresh Jobs, this field type indicates that the To Property will indicate a Content Manager, and the From Property will be a comma delimited list what columes contain Html,LanguageCode,PersonaName,DeviceType The last three being optional

member.name: F:Insite.Integration.Enums.IntegrationFieldType.FieldTranslation
member.summary: For Refresh Jobs, From Property is field translation property, and the From Property will be a comma delimited list what columes contain translated value,LanguageCode,parentObject,parentTable

member.name: T:Insite.Integration.Enums.IntegrationJobLinkedJobCondition
member.summary: Enum that represents the various types of conditions to evaluate when an integration job completes (success or fail) and has a linked job.

member.summary: Enum that represents the various Notify Conditions of an JobDefinition.

member.name: T:Insite.Integration.Enums.IntegrationJobStatus
member.summary: Enum that represents the various statuses of an IntegrationJob.

member.name: T:Insite.Integration.Enums.IntegrationParameterValueType
member.summary: Enum that represents the various types of values for an JobDefinitionStepParameter and JobDefinitionParameter.
member.remarks: Enum for JobDefinitionStepParameter.ValueType and JobDefinitionParameter.ValueType fields

member.name: F:Insite.Integration.Enums.IntegrationParameterValueType.SpecificDateTime
member.summary: To Enter a specific DateTime

member.name: F:Insite.Integration.Enums.IntegrationParameterValueType.RelativeDateTime
member.summary: To use a relative DateTime from the current DateTime, for example, a value of 1 would mean the current date plus one day, -1 would be the current date minus one day

member.name: F:Insite.Integration.Enums.IntegrationParameterValueType.SystemSetting
member.summary: Specify the name of the SystemSetting to use in the Default Value of the Parameter

member.name: T:Insite.Integration.Enums.IntegrationRecurringType
member.summary: Enum that represents the various types of recurrence for IntegrationJob.

member.summary: Enum that represents the various types of an JobDefinition.
